alert.note: Alert for Cherokee; Wagoner (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 6:43AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Delaware, southeastern Mayes, northeastern Wagoner and northern Cherokee Counties through 730 AM CDT... At 642 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 4 miles southeast of Locust Grove to 3 miles southeast of Wagoner. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Tahlequah... Wagoner... Chouteau... Locust Grove... Kansas... Hulbert... Oaks... Eldon... Peggs... Leach... Scraper... Twin Oaks... Sequoyah State Park... Lost City... Murphy... Mazie... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
